summary: Turns blur and Shadow Shield into a fire and forget spell. duration scales with illusion and is the same as mage armor spells with the stability perk.
descriptionHtml:
Turns blur and Shadow Shield into a fire and forget spell. duration scales with illusion and is the same as mage armor spells with the stability perk.

you will need to add it through console as I haven't quite mastered adding spells to leveled lists and such and I would rather that then break your game. just type help "blur II" or help "shadow shield II"
author: MrCooney
